Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game.Market
Direct Known Subclasses:
MarketTest
public class Market extends Object
Class Market is used to represent and describe the Market system in the game. Meaning the market formed by a matrix of 3 rows and 4 columns which can move based on the user's action.
Author:
Alessio Piovesan, Pier Giorgio Prosperi, Matteo Salamone

  • Method Details

    • fillMarket

      private Colours[][] fillMarket​(List<Colours> marbles)
      Method fillMarket fills the Market with random marbles (described with Colours) at the start of the game.
      Parameters:
      marbles - of type List - the marbles used inside the Market
      Returns:
      m of type bi-dimensional Array - returns the filled Market at the start of the game

    • fillColumns

      private void fillColumns​(List<Colours> marbles, List<Integer> list, int x, int y, Colours[][] m, int j)
      Method fillColumns serves as support for fillMarket. This method uses findNextMarble to fill the Market with a chosen Marble that hasn't been placed before.
      Parameters:
      marbles - of type List of Colours
      list - of List of Integer - list of indexes of List Marbles that have already been used.
      x - of type int - rows of Market
      y - of type int - columns of Market
      m - of type bi-dimensional Array - Market
      j - of type j - column being filled by the method

    • findFirstExternal

      private void findFirstExternal​(List<Colours> marbles, List<Integer> list)
      Method findFirstExternal places a random marble as the external of the matrix that is later used to move the market.
      Parameters:
      marbles - of type List - Marbles
      list - of type List

    • findNextMarble

      private int findNextMarble​(List<Integer> list, int x, int y)
      Method findNextMarble finds a Marble that hasn't been used before.
      Parameters:
      list - of type List - used to know which marbles have already been placed
      x - of type int - row of Market
      y - of type int - column of Market
      Returns:
      int - index of the marble that hasn't been placed

    • moveMarbles

      public List<Colours> moveMarbles​(int choice)
      Method moveMarbles takes resources from the Market based on the player's choice and uses the method move to move the Market
      Parameters:
      choice - of type int - is the choice made by the user of either row or column
      Returns:
      List of resources from the Market

    • getRes

      private LinkedList<Colours> getRes​(int choice)
      Method getRes gets the Resources from the market based on the player's choice
      Parameters:
      choice - of type int - Player's choice
      Returns:
      LinkedList - returns a list of resources from the market
      See Also:
      moveMarbles(int)

    • move

      private void move​(int choice, Colours r1)
      Method move moves the Market
      Parameters:
      choice - of type int - Player's choice
      r1 - of type Colours - external Marble
      See Also:
      moveMarbles(int)
